creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Sawankhalok jar globular shape on ring foot, short neck and small mouth, loop handles; dark brown glaze, lines circling top half of jar
medium:
Sawankalok ware, Ban Ko Noi area
Stoneware with carved decor under a dark brown glaze
text: The earliest glazes developed at Sawankalok are thin brown glazes which flake easily and stand in contrast to the slightly later thick chocolate brown glazes of which this bottle is a fine example. Such vessels were usually decorated on their shoulders with incised horizontal wheel-cut grooves.
title: Ring Handled Bottle
